content.question: The developments depicted on the map most directly contributed to the

choices.label: decline of sharecropping in the Southeast
heightening of nativist feelings against foreign-born workers in the West
passage of federal legislation to protect endangered species of animals and plants
unprecedented prosperity for farmers as crop prices rose and transportation prices fell

content.answer: heightening of nativist feelings against foreign-born workers in the West

topic.text: 6.9: Responses to Immigration in the Gilded Age

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
